DOC.brief_summary: Determining whether treatment with an optimized formulation of omega 3 for 6 weeks causes a 40% decrease in the average concentration of total microparticles (MPs) in the atheromatous plaque.
DOC.brief_title: Impact of an Optimized Formulation of Omega 3 on the Composition of Atheromatous Plaques in Patients Requiring Carotid Endarterectomy
